# The `FaultMapParser` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A parser for the &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;faultmaps section generated by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/faultmaps">FaultMaps</a> class declared in <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/faultmaps-h">llvm/CodeGen/FaultMaps.h</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A parser for the &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;faultmaps section generated by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/faultmaps">FaultMaps</a> class declared in <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/faultmaps-h">llvm/CodeGen/FaultMaps.h</a>.

This parser is version locked with with the &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;faultmaps section generated by the version of LLVM that includes it. No guarantees are made with respect to forward or backward compatibility.

Definition at line 25 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/faultmapparser-h">FaultMapParser.h</a>.
